subject: Musa acuminata (Cavendish Banana)
hypothesis: Biological Organisms are Legacy Systems running on Liquid Servers.

software.genome: Read-Only Database (No Write Access in clones)

vulnerability_report.root_cause: Monoculture (Zero Code Diversity). All units share identical source code.
vulnerability_report.exploit: Pathogen bypasses firewall (cell wall) and injects malicious logic into the vascular system.
vulnerability_report.patch_status: PATCH FAILED. No mechanism for OTA (Over-The-Air) updates in clonal systems.

conclusion.statement: The banana is not a fruit. It is a compiled object.
conclusion.implication: If we can read this code, we can eventually refactor it.
conclusion.legacy_note: Respect the Senior Developer (Nature). Do not push to prod without testing.
